channel.title: IaaS on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in IaaS on Memo Tut

item.title: A story that I saw various services when I searched for as a Service from AaaS to ZaaS
item.description: #Introduction In recent years, I often hear the word ~~ as a Service such as IaaS (Infrastructure as a Service) and PaaS (Platform as a Service) in IT area. Here, I would like to collectively call them [A-Z]aaS. I think that there are increasing opportunities to listen to various [A-Z]aaS such as BaaS (Backend as a Service) such as Firebase and FaaS (Function as a Service) such as AWS Lambda.
